sentences.en: ...one of Britain's best-loved cartoon characters, Rupert the Bear.
sentences.cn: 英国最受欢迎的漫画形象之一——鲁珀特熊

sentences.en: A prince turns into a frog in this cartoon fairytale.
sentences.cn: 在这个卡通童话里王子变成了一只青蛙。

sentences.en: cartoon characters such as Donald Duck
sentences.cn: 唐老鸭一类的卡通人物

sentences.en: His cartoon mercilessly lampoon the leading politician of the day.
sentences.cn: 他的讽刺漫画无情地挖苦了当今的政界要人.

sentences.en: My eyes went to the top of the cartoon.
sentences.cn: 我的眼睛转到了漫画的顶端.

sentences.en: One of my favorite cartoon characters is Snoopy.
sentences.cn: 史努比是我最喜爱的卡通人物之一。

sentences.en: Thank you. I forgot to watch TV. When does the cartoon show begin?
sentences.cn: 谢谢. 我忘记看电视了.卡通片什么时候开始?

sentences.en: That's what comes from vitamins shaped like cartoon characters.
sentences.cn: 这 肯定 是那些卡通维他命药丸搞的了.

sentences.en: the cartoon figure of the mad scientist working in his laboratory
sentences.cn: 疯狂的科学家在实验室工作的卡通形象

sentences.en: The liberal New Yorker ran a cartoon showing Elennor going down into a coal mine.
sentences.cn: 自由派的《纽约人》刊登了一幅讽刺埃莉诺下煤矿的漫画.

sentences.en: The schoolboys were captivated by the adventures of the heroes in the animated cartoon.
sentences.cn: 小学生们被动画片中主人公的冒险经历吸引住了.

sentences.en: Their a cartoon - like look links Greek history with the modern Olympic Games.
sentences.cn: 他们拥有渊源甚远的名字以及卡通可爱的形象,这就象征着希腊的历史与现代奥运的结合.

sentences.en: Today's cartoon by Mike Peters makes fun of Ms Ryder's recent escapade.
sentences.cn: 这幅由麦克-皮特斯创作的漫画嘲讽了赖德女士的离奇行为.
我们观看了一部卡通片.

sentences.en: You can do so much with animated cartoon.
sentences.cn: 你可以用动画片来做更多的事.

sentences.en: You do realize that she is a cartoon, and way out of your league?
sentences.cn: 你知道她是卡通人物而且和你不同挂 吧 ?

phrases.tran_cn: 卡通频道；卡通电视网（美国一个专门播放动画节目的有线电视频道）

trans.tran_cn: 漫画，幽默画，动画片，草图
trans.tran_en: a short film that is made by photographing a series of drawings
a short film that is made by photographing a series of drawings
